entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM NST Saturday 28 January 2023
